core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Brutalism x Swiss Style x Disability Pride Flag
Accessibility First: WCAG AAA compliance is the baseline, not the goal
The 'Cutting' Motif: Use diagonal lines (CSS gradients/clip-paths) to symbolize breaking barriers
High Contrast: Dark Mode by default (Charcoal/Black) with vibrant, distinct accents
No Motion Triggers: Zero parallax, no flashing. User-controlled subtle transitions only

rules: Headings must use Lexend for character and legibility.
Body text must use Atkinson Hyperlegible (Google Fonts) for maximum readability.
Line height must be relaxed (1.6 to 1.8) for body text to aid dyslexic readers.

usage_rules: Text must be #FFFFFF or #E4E4E7. Do not use dark gray text.
Use 'Pride Accents' for tags, category indicators, and borders. Do not use them for large background areas behind text unless text is black.
Borders should be visible (1px solid #27272A) to define areas for low vision users.

container_style.card: bg-[#18181B] border border-[#27272A] rounded-xl shadow-none hover:border-white/20 transition-colors duration-200
container_style.section_divider: Use a diagonal separator: 'clip-path: polygon(0 0, 100% 0, 100% 85%, 0 100%)' or similar to evoke the flag's band.

buttons.primary: bg-white text-black hover:bg-zinc-200 font-bold px-8 py-3 rounded-full shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(255,255,255,0.1)] transition-transform active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border-2 border-white/20 text-white hover:border-white hover:bg-white/5 px-8 py-3 rounded-full

cards.interactive: group relative overflow-hidden bg-[#18181B] border border-[#27272A] p-6 rounded-2xl hover:border-[#FFD700] transition-all duration-300

inputs.style: bg-[#27272A] border-transparent focus:border-white focus:ring-2 focus:ring-white/20 text-white rounded-lg p-4 placeholder:text-zinc-500

navigation.style: Fixed bottom on mobile (Thumb zone), Sticky top on desktop. High contrast borders.

visual_enhancers.css_shapes: Use 'linear-gradient(135deg, transparent 40%, var(--accent-color) 40%, var(--accent-color) 45%, transparent 45%)' for background decorations.
visual_enhancers.textures: Add a subtle SVG noise filter to the background (opacity 0.03) to reduce banding and add tactility.
visual_enhancers.borders: High contrast borders are mandatory for inputs and cards.

accessibility_checklist.contrast: Text must have 7:1 contrast ratio against background.
accessibility_checklist.focus_states: Visible, high-contrast focus rings (2px solid white/yellow) are MANDATORY.
accessibility_checklist.screen_readers: All images must have descriptive alt text. Interactive elements must have aria-labels.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install 'Atkinson Hyperlegible' and 'Lexend' fonts via Google Fonts immediately.
2. Configure Tailwind with the 'Pride Accents' in the colors object.
3. Build the layout using the 'Bento Grid' strategy for the dashboard and directory.
4. Ensure every button and input has a 'data-testid' for testing.
5. Do NOT use standard Shadcn cards without customizing the border and background colors to match the guidelines.
6. Implement the 'Diagonal Band' motif as a subtle background element in the Hero section.
universal_guidelines: You tend to converge toward generic outputs. Avoid this.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures and noise overlays separate good from extraordinary.
